page.title: 06Mattersey Football Club Cont
page.content: The Club is financed by a '50 Club' whereby people (approximately 60) pay 50 pence per week through the season. A draw is made each week and Â£10 is paid out in three prizes. In addition two or three discoteques/buffets are held to boost funds and the highlight of the season is Presentation Night, attended by over 80 people at a local hotel. The night if offered as a full dinner with the presentation and followed by a disco. The night is attended by many in the village who are not directly involved in the Club.
